traits.name: Amorphous
traits.text: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.text: While in sunlight, the shadow has Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

bonus_actions.text: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the shadow takes the Hide action.
